media:group.media:title: Nintendo's Apparitions: It Goes Deeper
media:group.media:description:
Apparition. This word has become synonymous with Super Mario 64, its iceberg, and Wario. We’ve seen a lot of images and videos associated with the Wario apparition, and I think we can all agree that these are creepy overall. What you didn’t know is that Nintendo has made other apparitions, and they’re all unique. 

That’s what we’re going to explore today. 

TIMESTAMPS
00:00 Intro
01:23 The Mario Teaches Typing Apparition
05:00 The Wario Apparition
08:40 The 2007 E3 Mario Apparition
10:51 The Donkey Kong Apparition
12:18 Super-Secret Bonus Section (Tell No One)
14:25 Outro
